website_summaries.verdict: If sound and quality are your top priorities over features, it's a worthy contender. Otherwise, its competitors have more bells and whistles.
pros: A sleek design with straightforward setup and functions
cons: No CD changer – just plays one at a time
A bit pricey, considering its limitations
Digital display is small and hard to read

customer_reviews.title: works perfect, quality is very high
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of cake - loading mechanism is quiet, works perfect, quality is very high. The only what is annoying is a lot of functions and abilities of this product. However, I do not have complains at all. The best what I like that I can dub the music from CD to flash card or SD card even this product has a name Player. I use optical cable to get maximum from the sound. The only what I do not understand - I cannot turn unit on/off with remote....
customer_reviews.author: Taras D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid CD Player
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid CD player. Because I still have many CDs (in addition to the many downloaded digital versions that most of us now have), I wanted a reliable unit for playback during the next few decades. I really don't want or expect to buy another one during my lifetime, so I wanted something that'll last, and something of a slightly higher quality. This is it. I've owned a number of TASCAM products over the years, and they're easy to use and reliable. I've been quite pleased for many months.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Crofter

customer_reviews.title: Nice player!
customer_reviews.text: Plays like a champ. Transport is super quite, remote is nice but keep in mind this has a mechanical type power switch so it has to be powered on at the unit, by pressing the power button, not by using the remote. Just thought I'd mention this in case it's an issue for anyone (can't see how it would be as you need to be at the unit to load a CD anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Music at its best, even without the munchies.
customer_reviews.text: Just received delivery of the cd-200, and am listening to it straight from the box. Incredible sound! Isn't that what it's all about? This replaced a Marantz cd-6005. Surprised? I was. The build quality and reputation of Marantz is impeccable, but much of the music sounded like it had a blanket over it. Not so with the 200. As much detail as the 6005, if not more. Highly recommended, especially now that it's legal in Oregon. Thanks, Tascam.
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS UNIT!!!!!!!! Kick A@# Pro CD Player
customer_reviews.text: When I added this unit to replace an old Yamaha changer (I borrowed from my daughter when my Nakamichi CD Changer died) to augment my Denon DRA-685 and the original Cerwin Vega Sub Woofer/Satellite System with 18" sub from 1982, the sound was crystal clear!!!! It was as if I had a blanket removed from my speakers. Highs, Mids and low frequency jumped out. Highly recommended. Since CD players are a dying breed, this unit could have sold for over $700 10 years ago. Highly Recommended.....
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: nice player
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of the players and both have been working without any real problems. The only con would be that the play button makes a loud click when pushed. If a mic is hot anywhere near the player, the noise will be picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than the old disc changer it replaced
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the old disc changer it replaced. Looks well-made and is a pleasure to use. Great sound, but of course all of the audio components contribute -- but I think it's crisper than my previous player.
customer_reviews.author: Bugswilson

customer_reviews.title: This is my second unit. Again there is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. Again there is a hum in the headphones. Wish I hadn't waited too long to return it again. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drive failure
customer_reviews.text: "DRV ERR" after only 2 years of light use in my studio. I wasn't blown away by the performance anyway, seems slow to respond to controls. Update: Contacted Tascam parts - they want $151 plus shipping for the CD drive. NEVER BUY TASCAM! IT IS JUNK! I purchased a Marantz to replace it and will never buy another Tascam product.
customer_reviews.author: jawjatek

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice For Basic Player With Variable Speed Control
customer_reviews.text: Seems pricey for a basic players. Variable speed controller is good and would be better if it displayed the percentage of increase or decrease used versus adjusting each disc by ear. Still useful, nice build and logical control layout. Rack mount ears are removable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Santos

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make it to two years.
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of hardware, but died after 18 months. Just quit while playing with a "drv error". Manual says that means it is dead. 18 months is longer than the other junk I have had leading up to this, but really, not even two years for a "professional" player?
customer_reviews.author: George Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great CD Player
customer_reviews.text: Great CD player for the price. I had an old Tascam years ago and it did not disappoint either. Easy hookup, clear precise playback with no issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: dwhiteh56

customer_reviews.title: LASTED A YEAR.
customer_reviews.text: It played all cd's without a problem UNTIL IT STOPPED PLAYING AFTER ONLY 12 MONTHS OF USE. Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: j bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great player.
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues loading CD's one at a time. This is a well made CD player with great features and should last years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul-Tampa

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD NAME GREAT PRICE LOVE THE SOUND
customer_reviews.text: I DID ALOT OF HOMEWORK ON THIS , MUSIC IS MY LIFE, VERY GOOD NAME GREAT PRICE LOVE THE SOUND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wegs

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my church. Old Tascam wouldn't play MP3 discs. I really love being able to play tracks from a flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Endel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect CD Player
customer_reviews.text: We have now ordered about 5 of these units for our church. We use them in different areas. They work perfectly. Our old CD player was always having problems reading burned CDs. This unit never has any issues. If I had to make any complaint at all, it's that the LCD screen is hard to see unless you are looking directly at it level with your eyes. If you look down from above the unit, it's hard to see whats on the screen. Hasn't been much of an issue with us, we have it on a rack mounted about eye level when we are sitting in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Conley

customer_reviews.title: I don't go in for complicated when it comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't go in for complicated when it comes to technology, based on the philosophy that it is just more to go wrong. This serves its purpose and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Marlette

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use, still going strong. Have not had any problems with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Very well build & Sound Quality is Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The Tascam CD Player sounds great. I would recommend it to everyone. well built.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: easy to place the CD tray
customer_reviews.text: With professional machines that use some features. Durable button, easy to place the CD tray. However, sd and HDD has a capacity limit, 16G
customer_reviews.author: kang-pu ho

customer_reviews.title: Great player, Just bought my second unit of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great player , Just bought my second unit of the CD-200, Great players for my mobile sound studio, which is subjected to road use in a enclosed trailer with extreme heat and cold !
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Deese

customer_reviews.title: A great Player of many Disc's
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Music player. It plays all of my CD's and Some recorded CD-RW's I made. I hooked it up with the Optical output to my Receiver and the audio quality is High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P

customer_reviews.title: You're a fool if you don't buy this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine showed up a day early. It works flawlessly. It plays every CD I have, from brand new ones to vintage 1986 Frank Zappa CDs. Using it in my home system and it works as advertised. Never owned a piece of Tascam equipment, I am very pleased with the robust build quality, it's heavy, it has a no nonsense front panel design, and its speed of loading and reading the disc is beyond anything I've owned before. All for 200 and change ! Bravo teac / Tascam
customer_reviews.author: OBDEWL'L. X

customer_reviews.title: it is a great buy, excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Not the most handsome CD player, but for its price, it is a great buy, excellent sound, I will rediscover my CD collection., a death quiet (on its internal operation) great sounding player.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosUNKNOWN

customer_reviews.title: Really nice "ordinary" CD player
customer_reviews.text: No DVD, only one disk, basic black box... and that's what I want. Loads fast, tracks well, nice blue display. Perfect for listening to music
customer_reviews.author: opus111

customer_reviews.title: L'un des meilleurs.
customer_reviews.text: J'ai déjà possédé un double lecteur de cassettes audio et j'ai toujours été très satisfait. Résistant, très bien construit , il est encore utilisé par un de mes amis. Ce lecteur de disque compact a la même finition et est très bien construit. Facile à opérer et il donne un excellent son sur ma chaîne stéréo. Je le recommande très fortement. Tascam c'est du pro.
customer_reviews.author: Guy  Bolduc

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint, and it is minor, is that the display is a little hard to read if you are looking at any kind of angle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bird

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Investment
customer_reviews.text: The Tascam CD-200 arrived promptly. Simple to set up and just as easy to operate. The sound is remarkable. Having many years experience in commercial broadcasting I learned long ago Tascam manufactures workhorses. Do not confuse the CD200 with a record/playback unit. The 200 is single play only.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jetski

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a CD Player without all the bells and whistles..Tascam comes through again with a product I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Guy W Womack

customer_reviews.title: Sounds terrific. Naysayers complain about how bright the LED panel ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and quiet. Sounds terrific. Naysayers complain about how bright the LED panel is. Really? Really? Get over it. Better to see it than be too obscure and have difficulty reading the information.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zettler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment. It fulfills all of our requirements and much more.
customer_reviews.author: H Rickey Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked as advertised. It was able to play all of our digital formats. Unit seems well made and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: B B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Dough
customer_reviews.text: Rock Solid transport and easy to use with a great sound! Best CD player I ever had! You can't go wrong on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I like this player but knocked off 1 star because the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this player but knocked off 1 star because the remote is laid out weird and it does not switch fast enough from eject to play for me.
customer_reviews.author: zozo

customer_reviews.title: Full featured and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: TASACAM quality and performance are 2 reasons why this very versatile CD player is in my rack. The included remote adds to the feature set. Overall - totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Robust, Reliable and Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Using it for rehearsals and playback. Very flexible...It plays from just about any source, and it seems robust and reliable. What else can I say except chose the model that has the options you want. This one does not have the blue tooth but has a remote, so get the other one if you want to control the unit from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Burr

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty product. Very simplistic and works very well for the application.(stadium, rack mount). I would have gave 5 stars but I'll wait to see how it holds up a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and well made. I use it as a transport with digital output to my digital amp, so I cannot comment on it's analog output. Sounds wonderful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Chazin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, has all the features for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cd player for the money. Sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: BEC

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, completely silent, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this CD player primarily because of it's excellent transport, but I am so pleased to report that the entire unit is "pro quality" as advertised. Very well built and nicely finished; all controls function smoothly with a solid, high-quality feel. The internal transport is indeed top shelf - totally silent and perfectly accurate. I am utilizing the coax digital output from this CDP to my external DAC, but I've found that the internal DAC in the CD-200 is also of high quality. I have no idea whose DAC chip Tascam used in this CDP, but they picked a good one. Unbelievably high value item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reality

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Much better reproduction than my old player. And no more skipping!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed at church in place of old Teac with problems cleared it all up
customer_reviews.author: Frank W Teachout

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. So far so good. Been playing it almost everyday and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: John LaGuardia

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I expected this Tascam CD player to be awesome , but it has proven to be the best CD player I have ever owned.Aside from being crystal clear it is loud which I can't understand why , but it is.I had a Sony CD player hooked up to the same power amp I am using now , but when I swapped it for this one not only was the sound so much better , but the volume increased significantly.I had to turn down the mixer by about 25%
customer_reviews.author: terry johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best CD Player in the world - Don't settle for anything less. Great Durability and Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Lefevers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great love how it plays my music old cds, new, burned ones
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, ease of use and has a couple of nice features!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for, a rack-mount CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Do

customer_reviews.title: Display is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, and a nice transport. Unfortunately I found the display to be nearly useless. With the player set up near waist level, when I walk up close enough to press the buttons the display becomes illegible. I have to bend way down to get to an angle where the display becomes readable. I knew immediately that I would be returning it, which I did. I ended up getting an Onkyo C-7030 instead.
customer_reviews.author: BSEE1978

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great sound I rate this cd player excellent
customer_reviews.author: laron new

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it up and running, haven't had it long enough to give a durational review.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: unworthy
customer_reviews.text: the product was defective on arrival in terms of operation as the speed of the servomotor spinning the CD varied so much as this was like listening to karaoke or DJs spinning LPs. I tried different formats of CDs,all the same result. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Job T. Ittoop

customer_reviews.title: MIsleading
customer_reviews.text: Item advertised and sold as a recorder.It is NOT a recorder and is clearly stated on the item CD PLAYER.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Walker

product_meta.title: Tascam CD-200 Rackmount Professional CD Player
product_meta.description: style:CD-200TASCAM's best-selling CD-200 uses a high-quality transport, the TEAC CD-5020A. The new transport is custom designed for audio playback with a smooth loading drawer and low clamping noise. The internal clock has been improved for a smoother sound and decreased jitter. The CD-200 has unbalanced phono outputs and S/PDIF digital out on coaxial and optical jacks. MP3 and WAV file playback is supported, and front-panel Folder navigation buttons are provided. A wireless remote control with numerical track select buttons is also included.
feature_bullets: Plays audio CDs, MP3 CDs and WAV file CDs
Continue, Random and Program play modes
RCA and optical S/PDIF digital out

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
